TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSHttpBinding extends System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase

summary.span: 表示互通的繫結，支援分散式交易和安全可靠的工作階段。

span.span: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與 類似，不過前者提供更多的 Web 服務功能。The is similar to the but provides more Web service features. 它使用 HTTP 傳輸並提供訊息安全性，如同 ，不過它也提供異動、可靠傳訊以及 WS-Addressing，可能預設就啟用，或是透過單一控制設定提供使用。It uses the HTTP transport and provides message security, as does , but it also provides transactions, reliable messaging, and WS-Addressing, either enabled by default or available through a single control setting. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following sample code shows how to use the class. [!code-csharp[WSHttpBinding#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbinding/cs/wshttpbinding.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WSHttpBinding#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wshttpbinding/vb/wshttpbinding.vb#0)]

span.span: The that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結項目的順序很重要。The order of the binding elements is important. 它會反映建構及堆疊通訊協定和傳輸通道的順序。It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得 ，其中包含 繫結所描述之繫結項目的已排序堆疊。The following example shows how to obtain the that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by binding.
